LanguageData.CE_ArcOfFireAdjDesc:
Adjust the allowed arc of fire of this turret. 

Right-click to save changes
Left-click to cancel changes
Middle-click to edit the span of AOF
Hold {0} during setting to show actual targetable tiles.
LanguageData.CE_ArcOfFireToggle: Hold {0} and click to temporarily unrestrict this turret's firing arc.
LanguageData.CE_ArcOfFireReset: Hold {0} and click to reset firing arc settings for this turret.
LanguageData.CE_ArcOfFireCopyDesc: Copy the arc of fire setting from this turret.
LanguageData.CE_ArcOfFirePasteDesc: Paste the arc of fire setting to this turret. If the pasted setting is out of bounds of this turret, it will be clamped.
LanguageData.CE_MaxArcOfFireSpanDesc: The maximal and minimal arc of fire from a given center line.
LanguageData.CE_MaxArcOfFireDeviationDesc: The maximal arc of fire from the facing of the turret.
LanguageData.CE_Settings_EnableArcOfFire_Title: Turret traverse and arc of fire
LanguageData.CE_Settings_EnableArcOfFire_Desc: When enabled, turret firing arcs are player-adjustable. Some turret may have limited maximal arc of fire.\nTurrets will also traverse instead of instantly snapping to their target.
